result.eng: He should be at home instead of drinking in pubs.

result.eng: We'll have a drink in a pub nearby.
result.ga: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimhe

result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ga: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.orig: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna

result.eng: There was a big crowd in the pub last night.
result.ga: Bhí slua mór sa tábhairne aréir
result.orig: Bhí slua mór sa tábhairne aréir
result.html: Bhí slua mór sa tábhairne aréirThere was a big crowd in the pub last night.

result.eng: I think you're spending too much time in the pub.
result.ga: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairne
result.orig: Ceapaim go bhfuil tú ag caitheamh barraíocht ama sa teach tábhairne

result.eng: I spent the night in the pub.

result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé an oíċe sa teaċ táḃairneI spent the night in the pub.

result.eng: Smoking was banned in pubs.

result.eng: I go to the pub on Fridays.
result.ga: Téim go dtí an teach tábhairne ar an Aoine
result.orig: Téim go dtí an teach tábhairne ar an Aoine
result.html: Téim go dtí an teach tábhairne ar an AoineI go to the pub on Fridays.
result.ponchtml: Téim go dtí an teaċ táḃairne ar an AoineI go to the pub on Fridays.

result.eng: We [usually] play in the pubs in Woodlawn and in Manhattan, New York.
result.ga: Bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bíonn muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne i Woodlawn agus i Manhattan Nua-Eabhrac

result.eng: And we will be playing in the Tír na nÓg and Sláinte pubs in Manhattan this weekend.
result.ga: Agus beidh muid ag casadh sna tithe tábhairne Tír na nÓg agus Sláinte i Manhattan an deireadh seachtaine seo

result.eng: Inside the pub.

result.eng: There are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.
result.ga: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaine
result.orig: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaine

result.eng: I go listening to Irish music in the pubs.
result.ga: Téim ag éisteacht le ceol Gaelach sna tithe tábhairne
result.orig: Téim ag éisteacht le ceol Gaelach sna tithe tábhairne

result.eng: There are good facilities there: a shopping centre, a few pubs, a lovely restaurant, an hotel and a swimming pool.
